author: Kashmira Gander
title: What Is Nitric Oxide? How the Gas That Gave Us Viagra Could Help Treat Coronavirus Patients
description: There are currently no specific drugs or vaccines against COVID-19.
content:
As scientists race to find specific treatments for COVID-19, the colourless gas nitric oxide has emerged as a candidate.
Nitric oxide works as a signalling molecule in the cardiovascular, nervous and immune systems of animals, and is mostly produced in the i… [+7045 chars]
